stories.title: Mozilla Rally – It’s your data. Use it for a change

stories.text:
www.saaspricer.com is the website but you can go directly here to pass the paywall: https://airtable.com/shrN4hc6JemphAxuV

There are lots of details to SaaS Pricing ranging from defining the value metrics to determining personas to designing the pricing page. Well, these are great but how do people apply or not apply these in reality? What kind of products use freemium, free trial? What are the price ranges?

SaaS Pricer answers these questions by allowing to analyze 107 products at the moment. The list is built on Airtable and can be filtered in various criteria.

I built it after my various consulting work on SaaS pricing and it will be a good resource who work on SaaS pricing.
